resources.string: Save your battery and keep your apps on at the same time

Now you can click on the tray icon to enable power saving. Your screen will turn off while your phone is facing a surface, like flipped on a table or inside your pocket. Whenever you see your screen it will be back on. Cheers!
To save battery, the screen will turn off while your phone is facing a surface, like flipped on a table or inside your pocket. When you see your screen again it will turn back on. Cheers!
We can\'t do it without your permission
Lights Out runs over your applications, in the quick settings tray. We require your permission to do so. Please turn the settings knob to continue.

Lights Out turns your screen off while keeping your apps alive. When Lights Out is active it will detect if your phone is in your pocket or flipped on a surface and automatically turn off your screen. Your apps or downloads will keep running.
Follow the pictorial description of using Lights Out
The app can be accessed through quick settings in your notification tray.
We\'ll tell you how we do it

Lights Out works with the proximity sensor of your phone. Once activated anything blocking the sensor will cause the screen to black out. When your screen isn\'t facing a surface the screen will be back on again.
How to drag your quick settings.
How to edit your quick settings.
